segment.source: How to Determine the BitLocker Encryption State of a Lost Computers
segment.target: How to Determine the BitLocker Encryption State of a Lost Computers

segment.source: How to Determine the BitLocker Encryption State of a Lost Computers
segment.target: How to Determine the BitLocker Encryption State of a Lost Computers

segment.source: How to Determine the BitLocker Encryption State of a Lost Computers
segment.target: How to Determine the BitLocker Encryption State of a Lost Computers

segment.source: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) enables you to determine the last known BitLocker encryption status of computers that are lost or stolen.
segment.target: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) enables you to determine the last known BitLocker encryption status of computers that are lost or stolen.

segment.source: Use the following procedure to determine whether the volumes have been encrypted on computers that are no longer in your possession.
segment.target: Use the following procedure to determine whether the volumes have been encrypted on computers that are no longer in your possession.

segment.source: Determine a Computer's Last Known BitLocker Encryption state
segment.target: Determine a Computer's Last Known BitLocker Encryption state

segment.source: The default address for the MBAM website is http://computername.
segment.target: The default address for the MBAM website is http://computername.

segment.source: Use the fully qualified server name for faster browsing results.
segment.target: Use the fully qualified server name for faster browsing results.

segment.source: Select the Report node from the navigation pane, and then select the Computer Compliance Report.
segment.target: Select the Report node from the navigation pane, and then select the Computer Compliance Report.

segment.source: Use the filter fields in the right-side pane to narrow the search results, and then click Search.
segment.target: Use the filter fields in the right-side pane to narrow the search results, and then click Search.

segment.source: Results will be shown below your search query.
segment.target: Results will be shown below your search query.

segment.source: Take the appropriate action as determined by your policy for lost devices.
segment.target: Take the appropriate action as determined by your policy for lost devices.

segment.source: Device compliance is determined by the deployed BitLocker policies.
segment.target: Device compliance is determined by the deployed BitLocker policies.

segment.source: You should verify these deployed policies when you are trying to determine the BitLocker encryption state of a device.
segment.target: You should verify these deployed policies when you are trying to determine the BitLocker encryption state of a device.
